recipes.title: Roasted Butternut Squash with Chilli Yoghurt and Za'atar
recipes.imageSearch: ottolenghi butternut squash chilli yoghurt za'atar
recipes.description: Sweet roasted butternut squash is elevated with a tangy chilli yoghurt and fragrant za'atar, creating a vibrant and satisfying dish.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Ottolenghi's signature flavour combinations and vegetable-forward approach will delight your palate.

recipes.title: Spiced Lamb Raan
recipes.sourceDetail: Dishoom: From Bombay with Love, page 184
recipes.description: Slow-cooked lamb leg marinated in a rich blend of spices, resulting in fall-off-the-bone tenderness and intense flavour.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This is a classic Dishoom dish, offering spiced comfort food perfect for a special occasion.

recipes.title: Ricotta Hotcakes with Banana and Honeycomb Butter
recipes.description: Fluffy ricotta hotcakes served with caramelized banana and a decadent honeycomb butter, a brunch fit for a king.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Granger's famous hotcakes are the epitome of bright, fresh, Australian-style indulgence.

recipes.title: Chocolate Olive Oil Cake
recipes.imageSearch: nigella chocolate olive oil cake recipe
recipes.description: A moist and intensely chocolatey cake made with olive oil, delivering a rich flavour and surprisingly delicate texture.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Nigella's effortlessly indulgent baking is perfect for a pleasure-first approach to dessert.

recipes.title: Borlotti Bean Stew with Chorizo and Greens
recipes.imageSearch: bold bean co chorizo bean stew
recipes.description: A hearty and flavourful stew featuring creamy borlotti beans, spicy chorizo, and vibrant greens, all simmered in a rich tomato broth.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This recipe showcases the magic of beans with bold flavors and pantry-friendly ingredients.

recipes.title: Roasted Carrots with Harissa and Pistachios
recipes.description: Sweet roasted carrots are elevated with a spicy harissa glaze and crunchy pistachios for a flavourful side dish.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: The sweet, spicy, and nutty combination is reminiscent of Ottolenghi's vibrant flavour profiles.

recipes.title: Charred Cabbage with Lime-Cilantro Dressing and Peanuts
recipes.imageSearch: Ixta Belfrage charred cabbage lime cilantro peanuts
recipes.description: Cabbage wedges are charred until tender and drizzled with a tangy lime-cilantro dressing and crunchy peanuts.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish perfectly embodies Ixta's punchy flavour combinations, drawing on Mexican and Southeast Asian influences.

recipes.title: Nasi Goreng (Indonesian Fried Rice)
recipes.description: Fragrant fried rice with sweet soy sauce, shrimp paste, and a fried egg on top, capturing the essence of Indonesian street food.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Lara Lee's authentic approach to Southeast Asian cuisine guarantees deep, complex flavours.

recipes.title: Black Daal
recipes.description: Slow-cooked black lentils simmered overnight for a creamy, smoky, and utterly comforting Indian classic.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Dishoom's signature daal is a must-try for any fan of Indian comfort food.

recipes.title: Spiced Chicken Traybake with Chickpeas and Apricots
recipes.description: Chicken thighs baked with chickpeas, dried apricots, and warming spices, creating a fragrant and flavourful one-pan meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish embodies Diana Henry's elegant simplicity and travel-inspired flavors.

recipes.title: Puttanesca Sauce
recipes.description: A quick and flavourful tomato sauce with olives, capers, anchovies, and garlic, delivering a punch of Mediterranean flavour.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Kenji's technique-driven approach ensures a perfectly balanced and deeply flavourful sauce.

recipes.title: Sichuan Dry-Fried Green Beans
recipes.imageSearch: kenji lopez alt sichuan dry fried green beans
recipes.description: Blistered green beans stir-fried with Sichuan peppercorns, garlic, and dried shrimp for a powerfully flavourful side dish.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This recipe brings Kenji's perfect technique to bold Asian flavors.

recipes.title: Chilli Garlic Noodles
recipes.imageSearch: splash of soy chili garlic noodles
recipes.description: Quick and flavourful noodles tossed in a spicy chilli garlic sauce, perfect for a weeknight meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Splash of Soy's accessible Asian flavors make this a fast and delicious dish.

recipes.title: Baked Feta with Tomatoes and Herbs
recipes.description: A block of feta baked with cherry tomatoes, garlic, and herbs until soft and gooey, perfect for dipping with crusty bread.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish is a simple yet elegant appetizer, reflecting Diana Henry's effortless style.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato and Coconut Curry
recipes.imageSearch: sweet potato coconut curry lara lee
recipes.description: Creamy coconut curry with chunks of sweet potato, red lentils, and aromatic spices, inspired by Lara Lee's Southeast Asian flair.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish delivers deep, complex flavors using the authentic techniques championed by Lara Lee.

recipes.title: Spicy Sausage and Kale Pizza
recipes.imageSearch: spicy sausage kale pizza ixta belfrage
recipes.description: Homemade pizza topped with spicy Italian sausage, sautéed kale, and a generous sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This pizza combines Italian comfort food with punchy flavors inspired by Ixta's Mezcla style.

recipes.title: Roasted Broccoli with Lemon and Parmesan
recipes.imageSearch: joshua mcfadden roasted broccoli lemon parmesan
recipes.description: Simple roasted broccoli florets tossed with lemon juice and grated Parmesan, letting the produce shine.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This recipe emphasizes the natural flavours of vegetables in a simple preparation, in the style of Joshua McFadden.

recipes.title: Hummus with Tahini
recipes.description: Creamy and flavourful hummus made with tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and chickpeas, a Middle Eastern staple.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This is a classic Ottolenghi recipe, known for its perfect balance of flavours and creamy texture.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Cookies
recipes.description: Simple and satisfying peanut butter cookies with a crinkled top and chewy centre, perfect with a glass of milk.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Nigella's fuss-free approach to baking makes these cookies a quick and comforting treat.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Tender chicken simmered in a creamy tomato and butter sauce, infused with aromatic spices, a classic Indian comfort food.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: Inspired by Dishoom's spiced comfort food, this dish offers a rich and satisfying experience.
